chart.title: Scan Activity Over Time
chart.searchTemplate: | `tstats` dc(Vulnerabilities.dest) from datamodel=Vulnerabilities where * $bunit$ $category$ by _time span=1d | timechart minspan=1d dc(Vulnerabilities.dest) as "dc(dest)"

table.title: Vulnerabilities By Age
table.searchTemplate: | tstats `summariesonly` min(_time) as firstTime,max(_time) as lastTime,count from datamodel=Vulnerabilities where (Vulnerabilities.severity!=informational Vulnerabilities.severity!=low) $bunit$ $category$ by Vulnerabilities.signature,Vulnerabilities.dest | `drop_dm_object_name("Vulnerabilities")` | eventstats max(lastTime) as lastScanTime by dest | where lastTime==lastScanTime AND firstTime!=lastTime | eval timeDiff=lastTime-firstTime | sort 100 - timeDiff,lastTime | eval "Age (days)"=round(timeDiff/86400,1) | `uitime(firstTime)` | `uitime(lastTime)` | fields firstTime,lastTime,signature,dest,"Age (days)"

table.title: Delinquent Scanning
table.searchTemplate: | tstats `summariesonly` min(_time) as firstTime,max(_time) as lastTime from datamodel=Vulnerabilities where * $bunit$ $category$ by Vulnerabilities.dest | `drop_dm_object_name("Vulnerabilities")` | `dayDiff(lastTime)` | eval dayDiff=round(dayDiff,1) | `uitime(firstTime)` | `uitime(lastTime)` | sort 100 + lastTime
